website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and practical massage recliner featuring multi-zone heat and massage settings.
pros: Recline and relax using the side lever
Features multi-zone heating and massage settings, which are controllable from the included remote
cons: Some buyers note that the gap between the back and seat does not offer enough lumbar support

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, if it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: If this chair lasts, it is a great buy. It is new now, of course, very comfy, super comfy in fact. Once you get your own method down, it is not hard to operate at all. The massage is decent and the heat feels great on a sore back. I don't usually fall asleep in a chair, but this one I could easily. It goes back to almost a full laydown position. Update: it is no longer my chair. My wife has taken it over. I guess I’ll have to buy another. 1/4/2018
customer_reviews.author: MichMan

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a TERRIBLE chair. It is lumpy, bulky, when you sit in it, you feel odd steel bars under all the synthetic fluff....The "massage" function rattles, it doesn't massage. The heat function is functioned where it is constantly in the way and switches on during the hottest weather. After one day, it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Anahita

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes the chair.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the chair. It has a heater in it but it doesn't get more than a little warm. We had hoped to not have to use a heat pad for his back but that is not the case. My husband finds the lever for the foot rest to not work like he thinks it should. I was surprised when it arrived to discover you cannot clean the upholstery with and water products or dry cleaning products, so how do you keep the chair clean??????
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Big, uncomfortable gap between back and seat. The plastic lever gets stuck a lot when in down position. The remote for heat and massage has a cord that reaches only to my elbow. Price much too expensive for the product.
customer_reviews.author: rmckenna

customer_reviews.title: Want a fantastic recliner, well look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with the freight company in addition to the absolutely fantastic chair I purchased. The freight company communicated with tracking information as well as a reminder email about the delivery. Driver was courteous as well as helpful delivering the package getting it inside my residence. The chair was easy to assemble without looking at the instructions. When I sat in it I immediately fell in love! This is my first Simmons chair and I must say it has great support and is extremely comfortable. I couldn't be happier with this purchase and would highly recommend this product to anyone looking to relax in an outstanding recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Needs better massage unit
customer_reviews.text: I like to support products made in the USA and expect to pay more for them but this chair is way too basic for the price. I’ll have to buy a better massage kit for it, as all it does is pulse at the lumbar area. No legs or upper back massage. No timer. Heat works fine. Took less than 5 minutes to assemble and plug in. Definitely not a wall hugger.
customer_reviews.author: WebStudent14

customer_reviews.title: No where near worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this chair, I’d expect these issues out a low end chair. Right out the box the seat massage motor creaks and whines, the rockers cant be adjusted so my feet can’t touch to rock, I’ve only had it 3 months and already the springs creak and the whole chair feels like it’s going to give out when I sit. There is no smooth transition whatsoever when reclining back and forth. I am not a huge person I only weigh 215 pounds. Don’t waste your money get a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii DiveO

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's big, tall, thick, cozy. The complete opposite of my last recliner. It's very comfortable. I am currently fighting with my cats for my recliner that I paid for and I pay the mortgage. lol I really hope to keep them off of it, I hope to keep them from clawing it and I truly hope it lasts. This is one of my better online furniture purchases without being able to test it out first. Aside from the gap in the back and the motor sounds, which both have been mentioned many times by others and that the heated back doesn't get nearly as warm as I'd like, I'm overall very happy with my purchase. I very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andie k

customer_reviews.title: A steal😉
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin? First the chair is beautiful. Comfort is unequaled when compared to others . I have had the big name chairs, none come close. Ladies and gentlemen I don't give 5 stars very often, but Simmons corrected all short falls with great results. Do yourself a favor check it out. God Bless Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: Big gap between top and bottom. Looks very cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it comfortable but back has a 6 inch gap between where top and bottom come togeather. Looks like they ran out of stuffing and said hell with it.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler A

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin...chair is big & very padded, reclines easily and color is perfect BUT....the chair becomes higher than the ottoman (footrest) part...if your legs need elevation due to edema...this chair isn't great. Also right down the center of the seat part is a huge bump I'm the padding...it's so uncomfortable I can't stand to sit in the chair more than a few minutes. The design for this chair is awful. Haven't hooked up heat and massage, so I'm not sure if that works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Salley

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this chair is crap.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this chair for my wife to nurse our boys in. However, it was crap from the word go. It went together easy enough, but it was never right. There is a huge gap in the cushions at your lower back. The seat cushions began tearing within the first couple weeks. We are not hard on our furniture, and there was no reason for it as we are both well under the seats weight capacity, but now one of the main springs for the rocker has broken in two. This chair is useless. Already have to purchase another recliner. They should last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Madewell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of padding in the seated position.
customer_reviews.text: When I recline it all the way back, I don’t have much lower back support. I don’t know if i’m too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great for a larger man!
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfy this chair is! My wife, for whom the chair was bought, does struggle to put the recliner down a bit though due to her small stature. It says that it also has a heating function, but I have not felt a real difference between using it and not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kena

customer_reviews.title: Nice recliner for the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice recliner, so far very comfortable. Heat works ok, not so sure about message features, guessing it will take time. Man who did delivery went above and beyond his job title. Would give him a #6 star rating. Excellent job
customer_reviews.author: DARRELL C CALVERT

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Chair
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly fighting with this chair it's making noises ll the time and I have to grease up every joint that's metal, but the wood also makes noise WTF!!
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: "BEWARE OF THIS CHAIR"
customer_reviews.text: This chair did not come with any assembly instructions and my disabled brother is siting in his chair with no heat and massage, with all the many, many wires hanging down, I have made several attempts to contact the manufacturer with no response. Needless to say I am very disappointed in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... on the noisey side but it is a very comfortable sitting chair
customer_reviews.text: I've had the recliner since March 28th an now I've noticed that there's a tear in the middle of the seat an the handle is almost broke because the chair is so hard to close . What can be done about it cause it's not a cheap$$chair Only cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Betty Romine

customer_reviews.title: It has a metal base so if you're buying it for a big person it seems it would hold up better than the chairs with flimsy wooden
customer_reviews.text: It's a big chair. It's a little wider and has a higher back than the husband's old recliner. It has a metal base so if you're buying it for a big person it seems it would hold up better than the chairs with flimsy wooden bases. The upholstery is nice enough. All the heat and massage controls work. I'm withholding a star until I see if the metal feet on the chair do anything negative to my carpet. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the wood and their is a big gap by your Butt. Hard to get out of chair and massage and heat barely work. Served its purpose but def won’t last long at this point only owned 2 mths feels like years
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: chair
customer_reviews.text: · very comfortable , color is what i wanted , but handle is very hard to reach and to pull on , heat is very low hard to feel ,
customer_reviews.author: debra galley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gr eat chair! My lady with back issues wont stay out of it.
customer_reviews.author: JustBrutal

customer_reviews.title: The chair sat terribly. Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: The chair sat terribly. Had to return it. There was no padding in the lumbar area and offered no back support. Not sure if my chair was defective or not but hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Ogle

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this recliner for my boyfriend for his back, and he absolutely loves it. It massages his back in the perfect area, and the heat is a bonus. He’s a big framed guy, and he said the support and comfort is perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Loud if you don’t need motors added.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the quality for the price I paid. Though it is nota1200.00 chair. Motor very loud. Very comfortable & nice chair
customer_reviews.author: Lolli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair
customer_reviews.text: Came in a great box, guys delivered it and brought it inside the house, so far comfy and everything works great
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: nice dhair
customer_reviews.text: good looking nice furniture love everything about the chair we also ordered the couch. but the carrier is the worst iv ever had from 2 delays to changing del 3 times without any notice i had to contact them . nsd sucks
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. He really likes the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a month so that when i recline back chair falls back! If u dont want to recline i guess its ok. Comfy though
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Relax
customer_reviews.text: Every time I get in my new chair I fall asleep must work for me love it
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Chair is crap
customer_reviews.text: Got this piece of crap June 11 2020. Its falling apart. The arm is falling off.. Doesn't heat very good. To feel the massage you have to turn it up on high the chair shakes so bad. Very poorly made. The handle is very hard to put foot part down. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Christina Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Georgeous crushed velvet look in wine. Incredibly comfortable and love the heat and vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: wise one

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase all the way around! Probably ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: tanya v.

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Six months in and the chair hasn't broke in. Big hump in the middle of the chair, not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Love my new recliner
customer_reviews.text: Love my new recliner!!!! Had a issue with delivery but Dunia at O.J Commerce took charge and the problem was fixed.Great product at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.author: tim porter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Not well made small the power cord is missing. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i see wrong with this chair is i do not feel the heat . Not sure if it was the lack of labels to know were the plugs go together.
customer_reviews.author: lori dew

customer_reviews.title: but the chair is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Missing a plug in, but the chair is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: had to return
customer_reviews.text: too stiff and could not get foot rest down--just too tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heating problems from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: The heat never worked and that was primary reason for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Arms feel like they have different amounts of padding in
customer_reviews.text: Can't feel the heat. Arms feel like they have different amounts of padding in them
customer_reviews.author: Sherlene Bair

customer_reviews.title: Referred to bad web sight with no call backs from distributor
customer_reviews.text: 6 months after purchase arm seams tearing with light use. Warranty work is a scam. Referred to bad web sight with no call backs from distributor. Stay away from Amazon furniture purchases Simmons has a bad rep for warrenty work. Look them up..
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband is sleeping in it right now. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Combs

customer_reviews.title: Fathers Day and Birthday Gift.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is just perfect my husband loves it. It was packaged really well and very simple to set up. The guys who delivered it were very nice and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn H.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Simmons
customer_reviews.text: For a Simmons product, this chair did not meet my expectations at all. Large gap between back of chair and seat, which allows things to fall down into the chair, including the remote for massage and heat. Also, one of the two chairs has already separated at the seam on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, trouble with foot rest release, chair cushion seems to have "fallen" in ony of the corners.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn J. Mohney

customer_reviews.title: So far it looks like a really nice chair I just had problems putting ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks like a really nice chair I just had problems putting it together and I know how to do the heat in the massage but where do you plug the handheld controller into I don't know where it's hangs out with those other ones for the heat and massage no instructions came with this chair which made it confusing
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE

customer_reviews.title: its a nice
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I thought but for the price, its a nice chair
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES  MYLES  JR.

product_meta.title: Lane Home Furnishings Simmons Upholstery Rocker Recliner, Aegean Chocolate
product_meta.description: Color:ChocolateLarge scale pillow top channel back and seat rocker recliner with cool gel memory foam in seat for added comfort . Wand Controlled multi position heat and massage. Covered in a performance fabric.
feature_bullets: Bonded leather cover; Handle activated recliner; Hardwood frame

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars87 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
